snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s campaign promised free prekindergarten for every 4-year-old, and his administration has invested mightily in quickly bringing that plan to life.
abstract: Schools and parents across New York City are preparing for first day of Mayor Bill de Blasio's signature expansion of full-day prekindergarten programs.

byline.contributor: Stephen Farrell, Michael M. Grynbaum and John Surico contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s campaign promised free prekindergarten for every 4-year-old, and his administration has invested mightily in quickly bringing that plan to life.

headline.main: Final Touches Range From Flowery to Frantic as Expanded Pre-K Awaits Start
headline.print_headline: Final Touches Range From Flowery to Frantic as Expanded Pre-K Awaits Start
